title: Alaskan Attacker Kristen Faulkner Blazes to Sizzling Solo Win at La Vuelta Femenina
content:
Vos moves into red jersey ahead of race's first hilltop finish as podium hopeful Realini loses time in stage shaped by crosswinds.

Read the full article at Alaskan Attacker Kristen Faulkner Blazes to Sizzling Solo Win at La Vuelta Femenina on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
